mapper.select: SELECT pc.id, pc.post_id AS postId, m.nickname AS authorName, pc.content, DATE_FORMAT(pc.create_at, '%Y-%m-%d %H:%i') AS createdAt, pc.member_parent_comment_id AS parentId FROM post_comment pc JOIN member m ON pc.member_id = m.id WHERE pc.post_id = #{postId} ORDER BY pc.create_at ASC, pc.id ASC
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO post_comment (post_id, member_id, content, member_parent_comment_id, create_at) VALUES (#{postId}, #{memberId}, #{content}, #{parentId}, NOW())
